Package control

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
control.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PetrinetMenuController, PetrinetToolbarController, ToolbarChangedListener
public class MainController extends Object implements PetrinetMenuController, PetrinetToolbarController, ToolbarChangedListener

A controller managing all the GUI components at the level of the mainframe.

This includes the menu, toolbar, the text area and the panels inside the TabbedPane.
